text: hey guys it's angel today I'm going to
show you how to make a DIY comm quat
fruity concentrate now hop kompot fruity
is actually a Taiwanese tea shop
specialty and since complex or sometimes
hard to find I'm going to show you how
to make this into a concentrate so you
can use and store this in the fridge for
a few months give me a thumbs up if you
like complex and let's get started
first we'll need about two dozen
kumquats and three to five key limes
start by thoroughly washing your fruit
and removing any stems that may remain
on the top of the calm quats then cut
your con quat's in half and remove any
seeds along the way do the same with the
key limes but this time I like to
prepare my limes into thin slices once
you're done set the fruit aside and
measure out half a cup of honey and
three quarter cups of organic cane sugar
and if you guys are wondering splurge on
the organic cane sugar if you can I much
prefer this taste over regular white
table sugar next in a pan over
medium-low heat add your key limes comk
Watts cane sugar and honey stir and let
everything cook down and simmer for
about 10 minutes until the mixture
starts to thicken and caramelize then
add half a cup of filtered water and
continue to cook in simmer for five more
minutes when it's done the com clots and
limes should have a translucent like
appearance then let the mixture cool a
bit before carefully transferring to a
sterilized glass container for proper
storage once the mixture has cooled
completely it will thicken up a bit and
you can cover and store the concentrate
in your fridge finally when you're ready
to make your calm quat routine all you
need our few scoops mixed in with some
hot water to taste
I recommend two to three scoops for
every 8 to 10 ounces of hot water and
voila
you'll have Taiwanese style hot kumquat
fruit tea just as good as they serve in
the tea shops
so that's how easy it is to make this
comp lot fruity now I like to enjoy mine
caffeine free but you can always do some
black tea and add some of this
concentrate in as well I'm angel thank
you guys so much for watching don't
forget to give me a thumbs up if you
love kumquat fruit tea and I will see
you guys soon bye
